subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: D’Angelo Harrison scored 25 points, and St. John’s overcame a bad-shooting second half to beat Wagner, 73-57, the Red Storm’s 10th straight home-opening win.
snippet: D’Angelo Harrison scored 25 points, and St. John’s overcame a bad-shooting second half to beat Wagner, 73-57, the Red Storm’s 10th straight home-opening win.
